issues.description: The problem statement's UML specifies the field totalOrders as type int, but the solution declares it as a long. This mismatch in the attribute type can confuse students about what type to use and may cause mismatches with the expected tests or specification.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the type of totalOrders in SealSaloon from long to int in the solution to match the UML specification in the problem statement.
